posts.post_content:
Ah, the onslaught "tap five" lords.  
10 life, a 7/7, some selective mill, any graveyard res, creature removal and [Skirk Fire Marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skirk Fire Marshal).  
  
This is possibly the worst of the lot, and it is *sweet*.   
  
I miss Onslaught.  
  
4/5
posts.html:
Ah, the onslaught "tap five" lords.
10 life, a 7/7, some selective mill, any graveyard res, creature removal and Skirk Fire Marshal.

This is possibly the worst of the lot, and it is sweet.

I miss Onslaught.

4/5
